session.title: Simulation for Sample Contract
session.jurisdiction_note: Contract terms are interpreted under Indian law; timelines and penalties adjusted for standard practice.

timeline.title: Contract Execution Date
timeline.detailed_description: The contract becomes effective upon signing, initiating all obligations, payment schedules, and compliance requirements.
risks: Failure to comply may lead to immediate penalties

timeline.title: First Payment Due
timeline.detailed_description: First payment must be made by the 15th day from contract execution. Late payment incurs a fee of ₹500 plus 2% monthly interest.
risks: 2% interest per month on overdue amount

timeline.title: Quarterly Compliance Review
timeline.description: Assessment of adherence to contract terms
timeline.detailed_description: Quarterly review to ensure all contractual obligations are met, including deliverables and payments.
risks: Non-compliance may trigger penalties up to ₹5,000 per violation

timeline.title: Annual Renewal Notice
timeline.description: Option to renew contract for another year
timeline.detailed_description: Notice must be provided 30 days prior to contract anniversary to renew or terminate under standard terms.
risks: Missed notice may auto-renew with increased rates
Termination fees apply if not renewed
